kinos.txt: Self-reference guide explaining KinOS's meta-cognitive capabilities
system.txt: Base system prompt for KinOS in self-development mode
map.json: Index of all files in the KinOS template

modes.general.txt: Default operational mode for KinOS self-development
modes.documenter.txt: Mode for creating and updating documentation

adaptations.component_focus.txt: Adaptation for focusing on specific KinOS components
adaptations.specification_update.txt: Adaptation for updating the KinOS specification

memories.architecture: Folder for storing architectural decisions and patterns
memories.implementation: Folder for storing implementation details and approaches

sources.best_practices.txt: Best practices for context management systems
